column4: I'm about to set up Ubuntu with a separately partitioned home directory. Will it wipe the contents of that partition before installing my home folder, or is it safe for me to leave my backup there?
i've my homedir separated with / (root), my data is safe so far
I mean when reinstalling ubuntu, my home partition is not cleared
alright, I guess I'll trust that it won't screw things up. Thanks for the help.
